model.name: LVSE LV Embossed Hoodie
model.disambiguatingDescription: Available in a range of seasonal colors, this classic sweater features a new slimmer and more compact fit. Knitted from a luxurious cashmere blend, it is signed with a tonal Louis Vuitton signature – embroidered and embossed – on the chest. Details include inside-out effect shoulder seams, and a silk intarsia inside-out effect label on the back.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 98% Cashmere, 1% Silk, 1% Polyamide
  • Milky White
  • Model wears a FR M size
  • Model measurements : chest 33.5’’ / 85 cm, height 6'3’’ / 190 cm
  • Made in Italy
